titles.title: SF457 Author of faith, eternal Word

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Author of faith, eternal Word,
Whose Spirit breathes the active flame;
Faith, like its finisher and Lord,
Today as yesterday the same:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To thee our humble hearts aspire,
And ask the gift unspeakable;
Increase in us the kindled fire,
In us the work of faith fulfil.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
By faith we know thee strong to save
Save us, a present Saviour thou!
Whate'er we hope, by faith we have,
Future and past subsisting now.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To him that in thy name believes
Eternal life with thee is given;
Into himself he all receives,
Pardon, and holiness, and heaven.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The things unknown to feeble sense,
Unseen by reason's glimmering ray,
With strong, commanding evidence
Their heav'nly origin display.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Faith lends its realizing light,
The clouds disperse, the shadows fly;
The Invisible appears in sight,
And God is seen by mortal eye.
